name: Hole in One (itch) (oiidmnk)
description:
This is a game developed for the third Brackeys Game Jam. It's my first game. The theme was 'Holes'. Sadly I have to submit it long before the deadline ends, because I'm not at home. There is no HTML5 Version available because my system doesn't support building WebGL. I wish you a lot of fun playing!

Controles:

w,a,s,d - Camera movement

r - Run simulation

Left Click - Selecting/Placing/Rotating Object

Right Click - Deleting Object

Escape - Restart Level

Space - Edit Level

//Everything was created by me during the Jam Time
